ComicInfo.Summary:
From the creators ofThe October Faction, Steve Niles and Damien Worm, comes a new horror tale,Brynmore!Recently divorced and sober, Mark Turner has returned to his hometown looking for a second chance. He'll rebuild the old church into a new home... if the locals let him. But Turner Island has a secret, one tracing back to when it was named after Mark's ancestors. Who, or what, is Brynmore?
